gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 137, Mavericks 120
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Mavericks, 137-120, as they snapped a two-game skid to improve to 35-28 on the year. Myles Turner (20 points, four rebounds) and Tyrese Haliburton (19 points, 11 assists) led the Pacers as Pascal Siakam added 13 points and a season-high 13 rebounds. Luka Doncic totaled the 14th triple double of the year and 70th of his career with 39 points, 10 rebounds, and 11 assists as Kyrie Irving added 23 points and seven rebounds. The Mavericks move to 34-28.
